# include<bits/stdc++.h>
# define LL long long int
# define scan(i) scanf("%d",&i)

using namespace std;

const LL MOD = (LL)1e9+7 , SZ = (LL)1e6+1;
int TE[SZ],ar[SZ];

void update(int idx,int ma)
{
	while (idx<=ma)
	{
		TE[idx] += 1;
		idx += idx&(-idx);
	}
}

LL getSum(int idx)
{
	LL ans = 0;
	while(idx)
	{
		ans += TE[idx];
		idx -= idx&(-idx);
	}
	return ans;
}

int main(void)
{
	int T , N ,OP=0;
	for (scan(T);T--;)
	{
		scan(N);
		for (int i=0;i < N;i++)
		{
			scan(ar[i]);
			OP = (ar[i]>OP)?ar[i]:OP;
		}
		for (int i=0;i<=OP;i++)
		{
			TE[i] = 0;
		}
		LL ans = 0;
		for (int i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			ans = getSum(ar[i]-1);
			printf("%lld ",ans);
			update(ar[i],OP);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return (0);
}
